name: Runcraft
description:
A small game based on Snowcraft!!

Alien invasion to our earth, you must run away and throw the ball with your hand to kick them out!

Can you successful escape here?

● A self-learning homework game
● Blueprint with Snowcraft

Do you remember the memories we play on Snowcraft? Author is one of Snowcraft fans and this is the first time he make a game, hope that it can be finish by self and upload on App store. Hope you can enjoy it :)
